title: Steven Sees a Ghost
episode_desc: While investigating a ghost story for his latest novel, a skeptical Steven receives a call from his sister that triggers a chain of fateful events.
show_desc: Flashing between past and present, a fractured family confronts haunting memories of their old home and the terrifying events that drove them from it.

title: Touch
